summary: Suspect hints at alibi. Discusses 'box' in coded terms.

transcript.text: I was at the warehouse that night.
Don't talk about the box, not on this line.

summary: Emotional moment, weapon reference, and place mentioned.

transcript.text: He said something about a gun in the backseat.

summary: Suspicious movement and a second subject appear.

Unidentified person exits and heads east.
